title: Rename brand to Makana Man and update marketing copy for premium healthy high-protein snacks

requirements.text: Rename the customer-facing brand/site name from “Makana Packet” to “Makana Man” across the frontend UI, including the header logo text, logo alt text, footer branding, and any other visible occurrences.
acceptanceCriteria: Header shows “Makana Man” as the site name and the logo image alt text no longer says “Makana Packet”.
Footer branding text no longer references “Makana Packet”.
No visible customer-facing text on Home/About/Packets/Contact pages displays “Makana Packet” (except where it is part of an unchanged asset filename or URL).

requirements.text: Update customer-facing marketing copy to describe Makana Man as premium quality snacks that are healthy, high-protein, and suitable for all ages, replacing existing “gift packets” positioning on the main marketing pages.

quotes: It's a snacks, it's premium quality and very good for health more protin food for every age ,

acceptanceCriteria: Home page hero headline and supporting paragraph describe premium, healthy, high-protein snacks for all ages (in clear English).
Home page “Why Choose …?” section headings and descriptions are updated so they describe snacks/quality/health/high-protein rather than gift packets.
About page story/mission content is updated to align with the snacks brand (premium quality, healthy, high-protein, for every age) and removes gift-packet-specific language.
Packets page main heading/intro text and the “custom” CTA section copy are updated so they describe snack products (and/or snack bundles) rather than gift packets.
Contact page introductory copy reflects snack product inquiries (e.g., product questions, bulk orders, custom snack bundles) rather than gift packets.

requirements.text: Update SEO-facing page titles to use “Makana Man” and reflect the snacks positioning (premium healthy high-protein snacks) on Home, About, Packets, and Contact pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page document title uses “Makana Man” and a snack-focused descriptor (no “Makana Packet”).
About page document title uses “Makana Man”.
Packets page document title uses “Makana Man”.
Contact page document title uses “Makana Man”.

requirements.text: Update the static product list content currently defined as “packets” so that the displayed items and descriptions are written as premium healthy snack products (high-protein) rather than gift packets, while keeping the existing route/path and image asset references intact.

quotes: It's a snacks, it's premium quality and very good for health more protin food for every age ,

acceptanceCriteria: The list rendered on the /packets page uses snack-focused names and descriptions (premium, healthy, high-protein) instead of gift-packet themes.
Existing image paths under /assets/generated/ used by the product list continue to work (no broken images introduced by the copy update).

constraints: Frontend immutable paths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui) must not be edited.
Keep the backend single-actor architecture; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Generating or replacing brand images (logo/hero/product images).
Changing routing structure (e.g., renaming the /packets URL path).
Changing inquiry backend storage/admin inquiry retrieval behavior.

preferencesToAdd: Use the brand name “Makana Man” in all customer-facing UI text.
Position the business as premium, healthy, high-protein snacks suitable for all ages (English copy).
